title: OnZen
author: OnZen
content: Hello everyone.. I'm am new in Bitcointalk.. I don't know the proper work.. I have participated in a signature camping which is free.. They are accepting Jr member.. The camping is helpful for me because I'm new and I don't know how to do signeture camping.. That is my 1st signeture camping participated.. I requested everyone to help me. I don't know how to do signeture camping!!

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: You have posted in the wrong board, though, this should be in Beginners and help. Move it there.Most bitcoin paying signature campaigns do not require Jr Members, so you might want to rank up first before you can really think about Signature campaignsYou can check this thread to keep track of signature campaigns Overview of Bitcointalk Signature-Ad Campaigns [Last update: 05-Mar-23]But your sole purpose should not be signature campaigns. What is very important is that you attain knowledge about Bitcoin, other cryptos, trading etc. In the long run, it will be beneficial to you. Joining Sig campaigns should just be a small bonus.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Here, click and read everything twice, it should help you.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1684035.0Read that topic first please.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: The first thing you should set yourself as a task is to learn at least some basics of the English language. Use plugins like Grammarly, they are free and will be of great help to the other members to understand you better.About signature campaigns. You are not obliged to participate in the signature campaign. You can visit, read, and write on the forum, although you don't have any signature on your account.there are also campaigns where you can get some financial compensation if you wear signature ads of a certain company, but for now, you are still far from that. mostly because you are just starting rank, and there are very few (or no) campaigns that accept Jr. Member or even Member rank participants. most campaigns are looking for higher-ranked members, and it is desirable that at least some quality of writing is maintained here. which brings us back to the beginning of my post that you should still pay more attention to your writing.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: OnZen on March 07, 2023, 02:01:08 PMHello everyone.. I'm am new in Bitcointalk.. I don't know the proper work.. I have participated in a signature camping which is free.. They are accepting Jr member.. The camping is helpful for me because I'm new and I don't know how to do signeture camping.. That is my 1st signeture camping participated.. I requested everyone to help me. I don't know how to do signeture camping!!  The new campaign you joined atleast have taught you how to wear signatures, so that's a good experience. The difference between this free campaign and others is that you receive a weekly payment. To join a campaign their should be a announcement of openings or vacant spots in the campaign. And you must read the requirements to ensure that you meet the required qualification. You must also get a Bitcoin address from which you will receive your payments. Most campaigns don't accept junior members, hence you should keep contributing to the forum and get more activities and merits.

comments.body: No offense — but how would you even contribute to the forum by posting if you can't even figure out yourself how signature campaigns work? Especially knowing that I don't even know if you know much about bitcoin at all.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: OnZen on March 07, 2023, 02:01:08 PMSnippedOP it's a good thing that you have chosen to first participated in a free signature campaign but know this that it's not a requirement for participating in a paid signature campaign, but it will help you get familiar with it, also what you needed most for now is dedication, you need time to study the forum first, read the rules and regulations here, because you're here to build a career and bitcointalk community is designed for every discussion about bitcoin, so you will need to learn and remain active, get used to the bitcoin discussion boards and read alot about bitcoin, then begin to contribute to the forum by meeting up with ranks growth and requirements that can place you on any signature campaign eligibility, if you build your profile well and there's an open slot or new campaign, the manager may find you fit in for participation.

That is my 1st signeture camping participated..You should try to type your post without typos that are terrible.Joining signature campaign should not be your most priority here and joining it or not, you must read forum rules to not break them.Welcome messageUnofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQSignature Campaign Guidelines (read this before starting or joining a campaign)If you want to sharpen your writing skills, please readBitcointalk posting etiquetteMake your topic title, posts more attractive

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: You don't have to learn anything about signature campaigns, it basically just entails wearing a signature/avatar and complying with specific campaign rules. What you need to work on is your contribution to the forum as that is your passport to joining a signature campaign. Without merits you can't rank up, and if you don't rank up you can't join signature campaigns, thus you need to develop your communication skills and crypto knowledge which would enable you become a helpful user and rank up in the process. Mind you that if you solely concentrate on signature campaigns from the get-go, you might end up never participating in one OR you might join bounties out of desperation/frustration.

comments.author: CoolBoybd
comments.body: First of all you have to rankup your account at least full member to earn a good amount from signature campaign. Member and jr member also can earn a good amount of bounty token. You just need to follow bounty rules and post among the forum.

comments.author: mamesso
comments.body: How can we help? What you asked you already found the answer. You say the free Campaign has helped to use the Signature code on your profile, that's very good. Then start looking for Paid Campaigns in Bounties (Altcoins) that accept Jr. Member, because most Bitcoin paid Signature Campaigns only accept rank Full member +.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Hey there, OnZen!Here's some advice on a few things that have been mentioned in this thread:Firstly, it's a good idea to learn some basic English to make it easier for others to understand your posts. Using free tools for checking spelling and grammar, like Grammarly, can help you with this.Regarding signature campaigns, they're not mandatory, so don't stress if you don't participate in them. If you do decide to join, make sure you understand the rules and aim for good quality posts. However, it's more important to focus on developing your communication skills and your knowledge about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies to become a helpful member of the forum and rank up.Lastly, remember to read and follow the forum rules to avoid breaking them.Hope this helps. Happy posting!

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: You now need 6 merits in addition to about 6 posts to reach member rank. Some bounty campaigns accept members. You can join them and get payments in altcoins and tokens. It is true that it is not worth much, but it is the beginning.When you reach the rank of a full member, your chances of joining campaigns that pay using bitcoin payments will increase.
